name: Pi - Vi / Пи - Ви
description:
2D platformer about a lizard eublephar Pi-Vi.

Pi-Vi wants to become a star lizard. The gods have promised to grant her wish if the lizard can save all the stonedudes on her journey and rebuild the temple.

Her tail is her main helper in this difficult task.Use it to leap and attack, rebuild the temple and make Pi-Vi's dream come true.

Warning! There is a delay when pressing the space bar
